title: Locker Signouts
description: If a student in the math faculty is on a study term and has paid their MathSoc fee, they are eligible to book a locker for the period of the term. No perishable foods are allowed to be stored to avoid attracting pests.
subdescription: Lockers are on a term-by-term and first come first serve basis. Locker will be available during the second week of the term. To sign out a locker, please click the button below. Make sure you are signed in with your UWaterloo account.
